subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah leads a deep crop of 3-year-olds into Saturday’s Kentucky Derby, for which the quality of the horses has been the prominent story line.
snippet: American Pharoah leads a deep crop of 3-year-olds into Saturday’s Kentucky Derby, for which the quality of the horses has been the prominent story line.
